title: X-Ray Contrast- 350 - 100 ml with procedure, appliances & extra film (10001)
text: X-rays are a type of radiation called electromagnetic waves. X-ray imaging creates pictures of the inside of your body. The images show the parts of your body in different shades of black and white.

title: Video Varicial Banding (MR)
text: The development of esophageal varices in cirrhotic patients carries a significant risk of hemorrhage and associated morbidity/mortality. Universal endoscopic screening, however, is invasive and expensive.

title: X-Ray Contrast- 350 - 100 ml with procedure, appliances & extra film (10001)
text: X-rays are a type of radiation called electromagnetic waves. X-ray imaging creates pictures of the inside of your body. The images show the parts of your body in different shades of black and white. This is because different tissues absorb different amounts of radiation.
